text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Automatic Implantable Cardioverter/Defibrillator Procedures

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    233169004 Automatic defibrillator procedure (procedure)
    233170003 Implantation of automatic cardiac defibrillator (procedure)
    233171004 Removal of automatic cardiac defibrillator (procedure)
    34955007 Revision of automatic implantable cardioverter/defibrillator (procedure)
    395218007 Implantation of internal cardiac defibrillator (procedure)
    395224001 Removal of internal cardiac defibrillator (procedure)
    425435003 Implantation of cardioverter defibrillator with one electrode lead (procedure)
    427508005 Implantation of cardioverter defibrillator with two electrode leads (procedure)
    428555003 Transvenous implantation of automatic cardiac defibrillator (procedure)
    432092009 Insertion of cardiac defibrillator using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    432852006 Replacement of cardiac defibrillator using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    433844000 Insertion of cardiac biventricular implantable cardioverter defibrillator using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    442249009 Implantation of cardioverter defibrillator with three electrode leads (procedure)
    443355007 Insertion of dual chamber pulse generator and repositioning of cardioverter defibrillation pulse generator lead (procedure)
    447365002 Insertion of biventricular implantable cardioverter defibrillator (procedure)
    448198004 Removal of cardiac biventricular implantable cardioverter defibrillator using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    448841009 Replacement of cardiac biventricular implantable cardioverter defibrillator using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    450661000124102 Defibrillation using automated external cardiac defibrillator (procedure)
    450821005 Replacement of pulse generator of implantable cardioverter defibrillator using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    45965006 Implantation of automatic cardioverter/defibrillator, total system (procedure)
    46634008 Repositioning of cardioverter/defibrillator leads (procedure)
    56784002 Removal of automatic implantable cardioverter/defibrillator pads and electrodes (procedure)
    65936006 Repositioning of cardioverter/defibrillator pulse generator (procedure)
    697953001 Maintenance of automatic cardiac defibrillator (procedure)
    698863008 Replacement of pulse generator of automatic cardioverter/defibrillator (procedure)
    698864002 Replacement of lead of automatic cardioverter/defibrillator (procedure)
    699136000 Insertion of pulse generator of implantable cardioverter defibrillator (procedure)
    700223001 Checking of automatic implantable cardiac defibrillator (procedure)
    713077000 Removal of automatic cardiac defibrillator using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    71372002 Replacement of automatic cardioverter/defibrillator, total system (procedure)
    736700005 Revision of internal cardiac defibrillator lead using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    736702002 Revision of biventricular permanent pacemaker lead using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    771557007 Replacement of cardiac biventricular implantable cardioverter defibrillator (procedure)
    83393002 Relocation of automatic implantable cardioverter/defibrillator (procedure)
